Uses of Package
nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene

  • Packages that use nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene
    Our own extensions to Lucene, used by BlackLab.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.sequences
    Classes dealing with regex-like patterns of token-level queries, like required for CorpusQL.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene used by nl.inl.blacklab.search 
    Class and Description
    BLSpans
    Will be the base class for all our own Spans classes.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene used by nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene 
    Class and Description
    BLSpanMultiTermQueryWrapper.SpanRewriteMethod
    Abstract class that defines how the query is rewritten.
    BLSpanOrQuery
    Matches the union of its clauses.
    BLSpans
    Will be the base class for all our own Spans classes.
    HitQueryContext
    Provides per-hit query-wide context, such as captured groups.
    SpanQueryBase
    A base class for a SpanQuery with an array of clauses.
    SpanQueryPositionFilter.Filter
    The different positional operations
    SpansAbstract
    SpansAbstract is our abstract base class for implementing our own Spans classes.

    Class and Description
